dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S2271 IS: To require the Secretary of Defense to submit a report on security cooperation with Guyana.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Bennet (for himself and Mr. Kelly) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To require the Secretary of Defense to submit a report on security cooperation with Guyana.

section.header: Report on security cooperation with Guyana
section.text: Not later than 270 days after the date of the enactment of this Act, the Secretary of Defense shall submit to the Committees on Armed Services of the Senate and the House of Representatives a report that describesâ€”

paragraph.text: the state of United States security cooperation with Guyana; and
the additional assistance from the United States necessary to help deter a potential attack by Venezuela on Guyana.
